TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sow'hu_Sra, title = Sow'hu_Sra, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sow'hu_Sra} }

S.FORM: O Sow'hu Sra (Holam: 守護Sra, ira ko Midipot to Sra) cacey kamoko'ay a tilifi ega i Taywan. Misanga' Pipahosoan to tilifi no Yen-cu-min ci ina to tilifi ega. Mipasadak to 2015 a miheca saka 12 a folad saka 26 a romi'ad 9:00 dadaya. Mianingaya a patingso^ Sra: Ciyang Cen-kai Mayaw: Liyang Ci-woy Nayaw: Cian Yi-tung

O Sow'ho Sra (Holam: 守護Sra, ira ko Midipot to Sra) cacey kamoko'ay a tilifi ega i Taywan. Misanga' Pipahosoan to tilifi no Yen-co-min ci ina to tilifi ega. Mipasadak to 2015 a miheca saka 12 a folad saka 26 a romi'ad 9:00 dadaya. Mianingaya a patingso^ Sra: Ciyang Cen-kai Mayaw: Liyang Ci-woy Nayaw: Cian Yi-tong
